title: House of Obellius Firmus
description: The House of M. Obellius Firmus lies south of the Via di Nola and is also known as the House of the Count of Turin. Excavated in 1910, the house's name is derived from electoral graffiti found on the site. (IX, 14, 2, 4, a, b)

properties.title: OSM location of the so-called "Casa di Obellio Firmo"
